Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for the morning of January 19, 2025 ▪️ Before...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Summary for the morning of January 19, 2025▪️ There is a day or two left before Trump takes office, but it is already clear that he will not end the conflict in Ukraine within the days promised during the pre-election period. The likelihood of public negotiations is being discussed in the planning horizon of at least several months, and the Trump team cannot offer Russia anything other than a carrot-and-stick game in the form of more missiles like ATACMS, partial lifting of sanctions or threats to collapse oil prices.▪️ Official Kyiv, gradually by accustoming the population through various speakers to the idea of ​​the inevitable loss of territories, it continues to solve the problem of causing economic damage to Russia, incl. through drone strikes on oil storage facilities. Governors continue to ineptly fight back for air defense gaps (which has nothing to do with their competencies at all), the manual with stupid theses about the fall of debris continues to operate, causing irritation of the population and undermining confidence in the governors themselves.▪️ The analysis of the situation with Ukraine’s attempt to destroy the compressor plant was indicative station -Russkaya- in the village. Gai-Kodzor (Krasnodar Territory) with the aim of disrupting the gas supply through the Turkish Stream pipeline. After stopping gas supplies through the territory of Ukraine and undermining the Nord Streams, the Americans are left with the hands of Kyiv to destroy this route for delivering blue fuel to Europe in order to further impose their LNG on the EU countries, which, of course, will cost the Europeans much more. ▪️ To solve this problem, underwater drones are quite suitable for Kyiv, which are currently being tested in the Baltic Sea by NATO countries under the pretext of the need to protect underwater communications (this narrative will also be used to seize any Russian ships, conditions are created for a maritime trade blockade of cargo supplies from Russia) . ▪️ With all this, the fooled population of Europe, under the leadership of national traitors like Scholz, will certainly endure further economic humiliation from the United States and Kyiv. Under the pretext of protection from Russia, the Ukrainization of Europe took place, which greatly complicates the dialogue with the EU, with the exception of several countries that, in the immediate vicinity of Ukraine, more clearly see the consequences of feeding the Kyiv regime.▪️ Last week, the official resources of the Russian Ministry of Defense again pleased with the wording - in response on-, commenting on the attacks on the rear regions of Ukraine. One of the successfully hit targets was the ground infrastructure of the largest underground gas storage facility in the city of Stryi, Lviv region, where it has already been flown several times. ▪️ At the front, the Russian Army continues to shape the international agenda with real actions. Ukraine stopped coal mining at the Pokrovskaya mine due to the approach of Russian forces (the only mine that produced coking coal for the steel industry). Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk) is surrounded from the flanks. To the south, the success of our troops is developing to the west of Kurakhovo. Vremevka was taken, bloody battles in the direction of which went on for many months, and in the near future the garrison of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novosyolka will also fall. In Chasov Yar, after a change in battle tactics and deprivation of supplies to the defending enemy soldiers at the Fireproof Plant, this enemy bastion also fell. The completion of the most difficult assault on Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) is nearing. ▪️ The Kursk region remains the site of the heaviest battles. The enemy, constantly transferring reinforcements to the region with the task of holding positions at all costs (hopes to use the captured territories as an object of bargaining), also takes advantage of the typical weaknesses of the Russian Armed Forces in the organization of command and control, which was manifested by the current command of the group (and individual brigades ) and during the period of their work in other directions (Volchansk, Ugledar, Krynki are cited). However, in bloody battles, the Russian Army continues to liberate the Kursk region, aggravating the enemy’s position in several directions at once. continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above✨Thus, EU countries continue to bend to the interests of Kyiv and Washington to the detriment of their own national interests. At the same time, several NATO military exercises are being held, which directly indicate military preparations for combat...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺☦️🖍 Happy Baptism of the Lord! The Feast of Epiphany is a...
Description: 🇷🇺☦️🖍 Happy Epiphany! The Feast of Epiphany is a symbol of strength that helps you endure, even when it seems that your strength is exhausted. In the trenches and on the line of fire, the need for faith, which purifies the soul and strengthens the spirit, is especially acute. Baptism is a moment of internal renewal, which makes it possible to throw off the burden of doubt and fear in order to move forward. In war you lose a lot: time, health, loved ones. But this day reminds us that there is something that cannot be destroyed - an inner light that burns, even if it is not visible through the chaos and pain. For fighters, Epiphany becomes a symbol of connection to something greater than their own struggle, to a force that supports and guides when there is nothing else to rely on. May this day bring clarity and inner peace to our defenders. Even in the most difficult circumstances, Baptism teaches that the light is not only outside - it is inside everyone who continues to believe and fight. Happy holiday! Title: 🔁🎬 🇰🇷 Today, the Seoul Western District Court issued a detent...
Description: Forwarded From Awakening Dragon 🐲🇰🇷 Today, the Seoul Western District Court issued a warrant for the detention of President Yoon Seok-yeol. This is the first time in the Republic of Korea that a sitting (albeit deprived of powers) leader of a state will be put in a prison cell. The Anti-Corruption Investigation Department finally got its way after issuing a detention warrant to interrogate Yoon. The President, by the way, did not say a word during it, since he and his team consider the actions of the body investigating the case to be illegal. 🔻Thus, Yun will sit in a cell (they say solitary) for at least 20 days. Such events will definitely have consequences for another case - we are talking about the consideration of the legality of impeachment in the Constitutional Court. Creating such a negative background could influence the judges' verdict not in favor of Yoon. Meanwhile, the president's supporters broke into the Western District Court building, breaking windows and attacking police. Law enforcement officers will use additional forces to quell the unrest. The media write that the protesters are looking for the judges who issued the warrant to detain the president. @awaken_dragon

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Artemovsk direction: advance of Russian troops in the...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Artyomovsk direction: advance of Russian troops in the industrial zone and the Novy microdistrict in Chasov Yar. In recent weeks, Russian troops have managed to achieve significant success in the urban development of Chasov Yar. According to available information from the field, the Russian Armed Forces have almost completely captured the Novy microdistrict, the fighting for which lasted for about six months. In addition, footage of the presence of Russian troops on the territory of the fourth workshop of the Chasovoyarsky Refractory Plant was published on the Internet. The battles for the industrial zone and the approaches to it continued throughout December, when by the end of the year the fighters managed to break into the Severny microdistrict and gain a foothold there. The enemy recently published footage of the assault on the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in a multi-story building near the Avangard stadium, located south of the factory workshops. Thus, approximately half of the urban development is under the control of Russian attack aircraft, all that remains is to knock out the Ukrainian formations from the Tenth and Novoseverny microdistricts. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot communications @rybar_feedback_bot⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Russia #Ukraine #ChasovYar@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇸🇷🇺 What is behind the squeezing of Gazprom from Serbia? On ...
Description: 🇷🇸🇷🇺 What is behind the squeezing of -Gazprom- from Serbia? On January 10, the United States imposed sanctions against the Serbian company -Oil Industry of Serbia- (NIS), 56% of the shares of which belong to the Russian -Gazpromneft- and -Gazprom-. The sanctions are really serious, and can affect the economy of the entire Serbia, as well as the loss of a major asset for Russia. According to the Serbian leadership, from the moment the sanctions are introduced, nothing more can be done: even if Russia sells its part, the restrictions will immediately apply to buyers . The United States demands the complete withdrawal of Russian investors from NIS. The property management plan must then be approved by the United States. Serbia has 45 days for all this.🔻Read more in our article#Russia #Serbia @rybar together with @vestniksrbSupport usProject -Rybar-What is behind the squeezing of -Gazprom- from Serbia? Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 18, 2025 ▪️ At night, the ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of January 18, 2025▪️ At night, the enemy organized a UAV raid on our fuel warehouses. In the Tula region, a fuel tank at one of the region’s enterprises caught fire (it was extinguished by the morning, 5 downed drones were reported). An industrial enterprise in the city of Lyudinovo, Kaluga region, was also hit by a Ukrainian drone (7 in total), the fire was extinguished. At least 11 UAVs were shot down over the Bryansk region at night. In the Smolensk region, electronic warfare forces stopped an attack by 5 Ukrainian UAVs on the territory of the Pochinkovsky district.▪️ Our UAVs worked on targets in Pavlograd, Kyiv, Brovary.▪️ In the Kursk region, heavy fighting continues near the Nikolsky farm, the Russian Armed Forces are approaching Malaya Lokna, the enemy is counterattacking. The command of the Ukrainian Armed Forces threw the 79th airborne brigade into battle with the task of knocking out our attack aircraft from the outskirts of Cherkasy Konopelka; the enemy paratroopers did not achieve success. Missile strikes are being carried out against enemy clusters in the Sumy region▪️ In Chasov Yar, the defense of the main enemy stronghold at the Fireproof Plant fell, and footage of our soldiers at the facility is online. The northwestern outskirts of the city are to be cleared. This became possible, among other things, due to the envelopment of enemy forces from the flanks.▪️ In Dzerzhinsk (Toretsk), the Russian Armed Forces broke into Petrovka from Shcherbinovka and continue to squeeze the enemy out of Dzerzhinsk. ▪️ On the southern flank of the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeysky) direction, the Russian Armed Forces are developing success near the settlement. Enemy channels express concern about the city’s flanking.▪️ In the Constantinople direction (west of the liberated Kurakhovo), our troops advanced on the southeastern outskirts of the settlement. Dacha and north of the treatment facilities.▪️ The battles in the Vremevsky direction, which lasted for many months, ended with the success of our troops. Vremevka has been taken by the Russian Army, Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novosyolka is in an operational environment, the remaining enemy soldiers will have to leave the gardens (there are no roads left) and ford across water obstacles. Supplying a Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison in a populated area is almost impossible. ▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, wounds of varying degrees of severity on the street. Marshal Zhukov was given to 5 women born in 1947, 1960, 1960, 1970 and 1976. as a result of an enemy strike with NATO-caliber cluster artillery ammunition. Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on January 17, 2025. Russian troops attacked the training center of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Krivoy Rog with two Iskander OTRK missiles, and also launched drones at military targets in the Zhitomir, Odessa and other regions of the so-called. Ukraine. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces advanced to Petrovka from Shcherbinovka and continue to push the enemy out of Dzerzhinsk. In the Novopavlovsk direction, Russian troops expanded the zone of control in the Yasenovo area, knocking out Ukrainian formations from the center of the village. In the Vremyevsky direction, attack aircraft occupied a significant part of Vremyevka, confirming their successes by planting the Russian flag on the northwestern outskirts of the village. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vrem'evskoe direction: the liberation of Vrem'evka an...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Vremevsky direction: liberation of Vremevka and encirclement of Bolshaya Novoselka In the Vremevsky direction, Russian troops continue the operation to encircle Bolshaya Novoselka - today footage appeared on the Internet confirming the liberation of nearby Vremevka. ▪️The Russian flag was raised over the ruins of a two-story building on Gagarin Street - 300 meters from this place there is a bridge to Bolshaya Novoselka. As can be seen from the objective monitoring footage, the overpass is impassable for vehicles. At the same time, the infantry will most likely still be able to move along it.▪️The territory of the settlement to the south, according to our data, is already under the stable control of the Russian Armed Forces. But on the northern outskirts there may still be a focal enemy presence. At the same time, several sources have already announced the complete liberation of the settlement by Russian troops.➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️Thus, the enemy has lost the last road to Bolshaya Novoselka, which will obviously affect the enemy’s defensive capabilities. And while it was quite possible to stock up on food and ammunition, there were no longer any possibilities for rotation or evacuation of the wounded. An assault on a populated area is possible not only from the direction of Vremyevka. In the fields and forest belts, the assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces have already moved closer to the outskirts of Bolshaya Novoselka. And, apparently, if the Ukrainian Armed Forces do not take countermeasures, the village may be liberated in the near future. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for January 17, 2025 Today the parties announced the acceptance of the terms of the ceasefire deal in the Gaza Strip - the text of the agreement has already been approved at a meeting of the Israeli military cabinet, approval is expected from the government. If the outcome is positive, the deal will take effect on Sunday. However, for now, Israeli troops continue to strike various areas of the Palestinian enclave. Against the backdrop of the attacks, Hamas representatives appealed to international organizations to stop the attacks on the Israelis, since the parties had already agreed on a ceasefire. Raids by Israeli security forces continue in the West Bank, the largest of which took place in Nablus and Tulkarm. At the same time, Israeli Defense Minister Israel Katz canceled the administrative arrest warrants for Jewish settlers in the region - all of them were released home. On the Lebanese-Israeli border, Israeli troops continue to conduct searches in the zone under their control, as well as to undermine the remaining buildings. At the same time, IDF units rotated near the Mantara Dam in the Syrian territory they occupied. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇮🇷🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin and Ir...
Description: 🇮🇷🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin and Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian after signing the Comprehensive Strategic Partnership Agreement🔻Putin's main statements:▪️The new agreement between Russia and Iran sets ambitious goals, this is a breakthrough document.▪️Relations between Russia and Iran are built on the basis of principles equality, respect and mutual assistance. Title: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 Events around Abkhazia are taking an interesting turn. I...
Description: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 Events around Abkhazia are taking an interesting turn. Deprivation of citizenship of one of his closest associates is a long overdue measure of punishment for those who decided to take advantage of Russian kindness as weakness. And if they took on Ardzinba’s friends, then, we hope, measures are not far off against Ardzinba himself. #Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegram23 Ministry of Internal Affairs of Kuban decided to terminate the citizenship of the Russian Federation from a visitor from Abkhazia❗️50-year-old man committed actions that create a threat to the national security of the country. Title: 🇨🇦🇲🇱-Theft of Canadian gold and suspension of Barrick Gold op...
Description: 🇨🇦🇲🇱-Theft of Canadian gold and suspension of Barrick Gold operations in MaliThe story of Canadian gold mining in Mali is coming to a logical conclusion. The lengthy debate that began in October was caused by the introduction of a new mining code in the country. The Malian leadership demanded a 35% share in all mining projects in the country, instead of the previous 20%. The issue was particularly acute for the Canadian company Barrick Gold, from which they demanded dividends and taxes in the amount of 300 billion CFA francs (more than $500 million). And later, the Malian government issued an arrest warrant for the head of the corporation under the pretext of financial fraud. And so, at the beginning of 2025, Barrick Gold threatened to suspend work at Loulo-Gounkoto, one of the world's largest mining complexes. On January 14, the company moved from threats to action, announcing the suspension of activities in Mali. The Malians took advantage of the moment to collect the company’s debts. They removed about three tons of gold from the mine (half the corporation's debt), which the Canadians could not ship due to government restrictions. Barrick Gold still has hopes of restoring relations with the Malian government, but it is not a fact that they will succeed. Therefore, it is worth being prepared for the departure of the largest gold mining player in southern Mali and freeing up a niche for other enterprises.#Africa #Mali@rybarSupport usReutersBarrick confirms suspension of Mali operations, seizure of goldCanada's Barrick Gold on Tuesday confirmed it had suspended operations in Mali and that the government had moved gold stock from the miner's Loulo-Gounkoto site to a bank.

Title: 🇺🇸 Hearings in the US Senate of candidates for various administ...
Description: 🇺🇸 Hearings in the US Senate of candidates for various positions in the Donald Trump administration reveal new interesting details every day regarding the real political course of the United States towards Russia for the next 4 years. ➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Yesterday, for example, Scott Bessent, a candidate for the post of US Treasury Secretary, spoke. When asked whether he was ready to support strengthening sanctions against Russian oil companies, he answered positively. Moreover, Bessent demonstrated a willingness to review and refine existing restrictive measures, which, in his opinion, are insufficient. ▪️At the same time, Bessent hinted that sanctions would become a tool of blackmail if Moscow refuses to hold peace negotiations with Ukraine or if Washington’s diplomatic efforts are thwarted due to the fault of the Russian side. ▪️He stressed that ending the conflict in Ukraine is a priority for the Trump administration, adding that the US Treasury Department is ready to use all available tools to achieve this goal.➖➖➖➖➖➖Thus, the contours of Trump's very peace strategy are beginning to emerge through force-. And if earlier the politician threatened to simply overwhelm Ukraine with weapons if Russia refused to negotiate, now it is clear that the set of anti-Russian measures will be comprehensive, including actions of an economic nature. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport us

Title: 🇬🇧Failures continue to haunt the ruling Labor Party of Great Br...
Description: 🇬🇧Failures continue to haunt the ruling Labor Party of Great Britain. Another corruption scandal hit the faction. This time, the victim was Anti-Corruption Minister (ironically) Tulip Siddique. The politician is the niece of Bangladeshi Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina, who is currently in India after being removed from power last year. Her Awami League party is accused of laundering billions of pounds, including through property purchases in London. It is understood Ms Siddique previously lived in two houses owned by people linked to the Awami League and is currently renting a third. She strongly denied any wrongdoing, and her allies said the charges were fabricated by her aunt's political opponents.🔻One way or another, this did not prevent her from resigning. The events that have taken place are yet another blow to the Labor Party. At the same time, economic successes also do not inspire optimism. Well, it’s okay, but the Prime Minister managed to visit Kyiv. #Great Britain #Ukraine@rybar together with @oldGBRSupport usThe IndependentTulip Siddiq resigns as government minister amid Bangladesh corruption probesTulip Siddiq has declared as a government minister amid a number of corruption probes in Bangladesh.

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 17, 2025 ▪️ In the Kursk r...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of January 17, 2025▪️ In the Kursk region, the enemy deployed several detachments of former prisoners from the 225th separate battalion, introducing them into battle. This did not lead to success; enemy personnel were destroyed by drone strikes and artillery. There are battles near Makhnovka, Pogrebki, Cherkasskaya Porechnaya, as well as in the forest belts of the Sudzhansky district.▪️ In the Volchanskoe direction of the Kharkov region, according to the group of troops - North - the enemy is persistently transferring assault groups, formed including from former air defense and aviation system technicians, who were immediately he is trying to transfer it to the northern bank of the Volchya River. Over the past 24 hours, the enemy launched three such counterattacks, which were thwarted by UAV operators. In general, the implementation of the plan to create a buffer zone in the Belgorod region did not succeed; locals attribute this to the unsuccessful choice by the command of the group of entry points into the Kharkov region at the beginning of the operation. During the months of fighting, there is practically no progress in the front sector; heavy fighting is taking place.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Plotvyanka Farm in the Volokonovsky district was attacked by two drones. In the village of Arkhangelskoye, Shebekinskoye District, a warehouse of one of the agricultural enterprises caught fire as a result of a UAV attack. New Tavolzhanka was shelled. In the Krasnoyaruzhsky district, the village of Repyakhovka was attacked by an FPV drone. In the village of Belovskoye, Belgorod district, a car ran over an explosive object, and a man was injured as a result of the explosion. In the afternoon, our air defense system worked over Belgorod and the Belgorod region - air targets were shot down, one civilian was wounded.▪️ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeisky) direction southwest of the city, the Russian Armed Forces managed to gain a foothold in the area of ​​Udachny and Kotlino. Heavy fighting is taking place near Zverevo with the aim of advancing in the direction of Pokrovsk.▪️ South of Kurakhovo, our troops are moving west in -a pocket- along the river. Dry Yaly. Northeast of Constantinople there is also an advance of Russian units from the settlement. Shevchenko. In the area of ​​Constantinople, FAB strikes were carried out on a bridge. ▪️ At Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, our assault units entered the southern outskirts of Vremyevka. These two settlements remain the last ones that the Ukrainian Armed Forces hold in the direction. ▪️ In the Orekhovsky direction of the Zaporozhye Front, an intensification of strikes by the Russian Armed Forces is recorded in the area of ​​Malaya Tokmachka and Novodanilovka, where the enemy had previously pulled up its reserves.▪️ In Gorlovka (DPR), a woman born in 1964 and a man born in 1958 were wounded as a result of a drop from a UAV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine onto a passenger car. and born in 1952. Summary amounted to: Two majors Telegram Two majors FAB on the bridge West of the liberated Kurakhovo The Russian Armed Forces hit a reinforced concrete bridge near the village of Constantinople (west of Kurakhovo) with strikes from three FAB-500 aerial bombs, making it difficult to transport ammunition and rotate unit personnel...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of January 10 - 16, 2025▪️The Yemeni Houthis launched several UAVs at various targets in Israel. The declared facilities were located in Tel Aviv and the vicinity of Eilat. During one of the attacks on several villages southwest of Jerusalem, large parts of a rocket fell after being intercepted by air defenses, injuring 15 people. ▪️On the move - Ansarallah - missile and UAV strikes against the aircraft carrier USS Harry S. Truman were reported several times during the week. As usual, there is no evidence of success. The American and British Air Forces responded with a series of strikes on Yemeni territory, and the Israeli Air Force also took part in the attack.▪️Militants of the new Syrian authorities continue to search for alleged accomplices of the former regime. In the Jebla area, a similar search group was ambushed, and several militants were detained by the Syrian resistance.▪️However, this did not end well. The actions of the resistance were condemned by representatives of several localities, including Kardahi. Later, one of the resistance leaders, Bassam Nasser al-Din, blew himself up with a grenade during an attempt to arrest HTS militants. ▪️SNA fighters, with so far little support from Turkey, are not abandoning attempts to advance in the Euphrates region. However, so far no really serious actions have been observed, and the Turkish Air Force is providing rather formal support. ▪️Turkish aviation operates locally, striking SDF targets in Ain al-Arab and at the Tishrin Dam. During one of these attacks, civilians who semi-voluntarily came to the dam to hold rallies were injured.▪️In southern Syria, Israeli troops are already carrying out traditional search activities. The Israelis detained French journalist Sylvain Mercadier and Syrian lawyer Muhammad Fayyad in Quneitra. ▪️The activity of IS militants is growing in the desert regions of the country. Most attacks continue to occur in the Kurdish control zone. At the Kurdish checkpoint near Al-Kasra in the province of Deir ez-Zor, six people were killed in an attack by militants.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 Monetary allowances for officers in non-front-line units Let’s...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors Monetary allowances for officers in non-front-line units Let’s say right away that this post will not be positive now. At all. So for fans of the baseless -Goida- we immediately suggest going to VKvideo and watching the show -Stars- with Kirkorov. In November 2024, from one of the cities of federal significance, where there is no military military service, we received, among others, the song -We are officers of a nuclear power,- in which, using the voice-over of a neural network, an officer in verse expresses his feelings about the prestige of military service according to the main capitalist criterion - monetary allowance (salary). We don’t agree with the lyrics of the song, but we were surprised that the title of the song became a sarcastic phraseology in dialogues on the yellow telephone. We have repeatedly pointed out that in central, headquarters, and rear units, an officer’s salary is puzzling when compared with a food delivery person, for example. Bewilderment - because the Motherland spent so many millions of rubles on training an officer, he solves problems in the field of defense and security of the country, and the funds received by his family (most often, he alone), to put it mildly, do not always allow him to feel comfortable as a person. More than once we emphasized that the approach - if you want money, go into business - has borne fruit. People went into business and stopped dreaming of serving in the military and law enforcement agencies, which generally affected the personnel potential. Negative personnel selection began. This is connected not only with monetary allowance. The system of nepotism - rewarding the innocent and punishing the innocent - (army pun) demotivated people to serve in the rear units/headquarters. We know examples when experienced officers went to the front or to front-line units using tricks and punishing themselves. One of our acquaintances died a brave death there, and ended up at the front because he could not stand aside during the war. But these cases are out of the ordinary, because there is discipline in the troops and agencies, and you cannot just go to war and receive status, self-realization and monetary payments. Still, the Army is not a radio where you sit down and go to the front lines to take photos. This applies to officers who are not at war for various reasons. People of lower rank generally get around as best they can: taxi, build, trade. Everything looks as if statistical data on salary are reported to the leadership of departments in the form of not a median, but an average salary, and there is no reason to worry. It is extremely unfortunate that the decline in human resources continues. This is a kind of bomb planted under the defense capability of our state. And we are generally silent about the level of pay in the Police and the National Guard. Two Majors Telegram Major Court Zol These are the songs. ((((

Title: 🇫🇷 Reading about another data leak through the servers of the S...
Description: 🇫🇷 Reading about another data leak through the servers of the Strava fitness application is already as common as telling that WhatsApp is read by the CIA. But there are still characters who demonstrate an extreme degree of inability to learn. This time, the victims were French soldiers at the Ile Long base. The application, one of the functions of which is to track the route of sports runs by geolocation, has already repeatedly appeared in similar leaks. ❗️And in the case of Ile Long, we are talking about a nuclear submarine base with, as the French media write, an extremely careful approach to maintaining secrecy: at the checkpoint, everyone entering is identified using a facial recognition system and hands over their personal smartphone for safekeeping, but about the smartwatches at the base didn't seem to be heard. ➖➖➖➖➖➖As our colleagues @actualiteFR note, the Strava case is just the tip of the iceberg, an isolated example that was made public. It’s hard to imagine how much more personal data of military personnel from different countries leaks with the knowledge of management and is stored quite legally on foreign servers.#France@rybarSupport usTelegramActualités mondiales & françaisesEn 2018, une polémique était apparue publiquement au sujet de la fuite d'informations permettant la géolocalization publique des militaires via les applications mobiles de suivi des performances sportives.En effet, cela permettait de visualiser l'emplacement…

Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇦Ukraine is looking for ways to expand the delivery of go...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇺🇦Ukraine is looking for ways to expand the delivery of goods from Western countries On January 15, a meeting of representatives of 🇺🇦Ukraine, 🇷🇴Romania, 🇲🇩Moldova, and 🇺🇸USA (led by the US Assistant Secretary of State for Europe and Eurasia) was held in Chisinau James O'Brien) and 🇪🇺EU (led by Director General for Mobility and Transport (DG MOVE) Magda Kopczynska). Plans were announced to modernize the river checkpoint - Orlovka-Isaccea - on the border with Romania to be able to accept barges and containers. Currently, Orlovka’s infrastructure allows it to accept only ferries coming from Romania. This logistics channel can be used to deliver small consignments of military cargo to Ukraine coming from Western countries to Romania. This is also indicated by the delivery of a drone strike on the crossing on October 6, 2023, which indicates that the General Staff of the Russian Armed Forces received information about the use of this infrastructure for military purposes. In addition, plans were announced to open a new ferry line between the Ukrainian port of Reni and the Romanian Braila, which will require investments.✨Despite the endless statements and publications of Western politicians about some kind of truce, new projects for the development of military logistics attacks on Ukraine continue to appear and be implemented, which is more likely to correspond with the term military preparations than with the preparation of negotiations. Two majors

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 16, 2025 ▪️ In the Kursk r...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of January 16, 2025▪️ In the Kursk region, the enemy is attacking the northern section of the front in the area of ​​the settlement. The cellars were transferred by personnel from the 82nd airborne brigade, the northern group of troops reports. On the march, enemy reinforcements in two infantry fighting vehicles and two armored personnel carriers entered the battle, but were destroyed. In general, heavy oncoming battles continue in the region, the enemy is conducting an organized defense.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the enemy’s resources recognize the advance of our troops - in the northwestern and northern parts of the city in the direction of the Toretskugol enterprise, in the area of ​​​​the industrial site of the St. Matrona mine Moskovskaya, in the area of ​​the motor depot -Toretskugol- and in the direction of the waste heap of the Fomikha mine. The presence of the Armed Forces of Ukraine remains on the northern outskirts of the city, but the enemy, not without logistics, continues to hold its positions, although there are forecasts about the imminent complete liberation of the city.▪️ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeysky) direction of the Russian Armed Forces, actions to cover the city from the southwest continue. We are receiving information that our advanced units are gaining a foothold on the outskirts of the village. Successful. Enemy channels admit that our troops are attacking on a broad front, reporting battles near the settlement. Yasenovoye, north of Novoyelizavetovka, near Uspenivka, in the area of ​​the settlement. Andreevka, Petropavlovka, Slavyanka, Udachnoye, Zverevo, Peschanoye, Vozdvizhenka. Apparently, attacks in several directions should not allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to maneuver forces along the front line.▪️ In the area of ​​Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, actions continue to envelop the enemy garrison. The zone of control near the village is expanding. Neskuchnoye, fighting is going on in the area of ​​the settlement. New Komar.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the village of Tishanka, Volokonovsky district, came under fire. In the Shebekinsky district in the village of Malomikhailovka, a drone detonated in the courtyard of a private household▪️ In the DPR in the Sovetsky district of Makeyevka, fragments of a downed Ukrainian Armed Forces missile injured two women born in 1935 and 1947. As a result of a drop from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces onto a civilian vehicle, a civilian was wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsBearing off the head: our soldiers near Pokrovsk recently epically blew up enemy armored vehicles with an FPV drone. This iron box became a mass grave for them. Pioneer of the reserve🇷🇺

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⛽️ One of the few examples when the phrase - a blow in re...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⛽️ One of the few examples when the phrase - a strike in response to an attack - is appropriate in the context of the Northern Military District. The Russian Ministry of Defense explained that yesterday’s attacks on gas infrastructure in Stryi and Drohobych in the west of the so-called Ukraine are a reaction to attempts to damage the gas transportation infrastructure on the territory of the Russian Federation. In this case, the -attack in response- approach seems appropriate. However, it is not yet clear what to do with other -attacks in response,- which explain massive attacks on energy facilities, the military-industrial complex and warehouses. Because we are either engaged in planned combat work, fulfilling our goals and objectives. Or they poke us with a stick - and we only react to an external stimulus like Pavlov’s dog.#Russia #TEK #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramOperational reports⚡️ Statement by the Russian Ministry of Defense: In response to attacks from the territory of Ukraine deep into the territory of Russia with long-range US-made ATACMS missiles and Storm cruise missiles Shadow of British production, as well as an attempt to attack the compressor station -Russkaya-...

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺 Abkhazia, elections and the main ringleader of the past u...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇷🇺 Abkhazia, elections and the main instigator of the past unrest, vacationing in Sochi. To be honest, we would not be particularly surprised by such adventures of Abkhaz representatives in Sochi. If you dig deeper, you will see many connections between the current presidential candidate and local groups secretly operating in Sochi. But that’s not about that now. Everyone was sincerely surprised by the autumn events in Abkhazia. However, it is important to understand that the entire sphere of tourism, catering and restaurant business is one way or another controlled by certain groups. And their attitude towards Russia is purely consumerist.❓Remember how the unrest developed? Repeal the bill and return everything to the way it was before. This was the main condition. That is, the Abkhazians demanded the continuation of subsidies and the preservation of their businesses and possessions, despite the fact that they were the ones who depended on the Russian Federation, and not vice versa. Do you know what one of the former Abkhazian security officials told us? Russia simply thanks us for taking its side in 2008. And this is not a joke: many in Abkhazia believe that the Russian Federation owes the Abkhazians for the events of 2008. Who supports them, who gave them freedom - this is no longer so important, these are trifles. As for Adgur Ardzinba, comrades Two Majors correctly noted: he is the archetype of any politician who exists in Abkhazia. They are accustomed to the convenient financing of Russia, on which they feed themselves, their families and those who protect them at the right time.⚠️It is worth noting that the ex-Minister of Economy defended his dissertation at the London School of Economics and Political Science, and as a minister regularly conducted meetings with Turkish representatives from the Abkhaz diaspora in Turkey. In fact, while in a political position, he established connections in both the UK and Turkey. Many, of course, will say that this is something of a conspiracy theory. But against the backdrop of events in the Transcaucasus, Central Asia and the Middle East, does it look like an accident that this particular person aspires to the position of president and played an important role in countering Russia? #AbkhaziaGlobalistics - subscribe to the TelegramDTM channel

Title: ⭐️ Digest of events in crisis regions of the world for January 15...
Description: ⭐️ Digest of events in crisis regions of the world for January 15, 2025 from Rybar➖➖➖➖➖➖The @Rybar team sums up the past days and follows the agenda. Project manager Mikhail Zvinchuk spoke about the most important events in a video summary for @SolovievLive.➖➖➖➖➖➖🌬 Frontiers of the Northern Military District: the current situation in the entire Northern Military District zone, the cleansing of the northern part of Dzerzhinsk, the attack on Zelenyi Gai near Kupyansk, as well as the return of our prisoners. 🤦‍♂️ Problems at the front: fighters pay for the Internet to fight.🛸 War is just around the corner: Turkey's handling of the Russian muftiate and threats to Russia in the Baltic.💥 Explosive Middle East: Hamas's controversial -victory over Israel and the current situation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone.🤦‍ ♂️ Sheriffs' problems: a program to discredit national governments as an example Great Britain and Australia.⚡️ The insidiousness of neighbors: why is the Kazakh analogue of USAID needed, what actually happened to the Azerbaijani plane over Grozny, and also what kind of crooks are going to the elections in Abkhazia.🎤 Just promises: the non-obviousness of the decision to exclude Cuba from the list of sponsoring countries terrorism and plans to support the so-called Ukraine by Trump.🐬 Asian wilds: why the President of South Korea was detained and why Beijing is conducting exercises near Taiwan.🐘 The Dark Continent: Somali-Ethiopian friendship under the patronage of the Turks and the visit of the President of the Central African Republic to Moscow.➖➖➖➖➖➖Watch - Rybaryan's analysis - @SolovievLive on weekdays at 21.00 (as part of Newsroom) and on Sunday at 21.40. ❣ peace.

Title: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Many Israelis have been writing all evening about the vi...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Many Israeli resources have been writing about the victory of Hamas in the confrontation with Israel all evening, criticizing the prisoner exchange deal. New details of the agreement are constantly appearing on the Internet, and Palestinians in the Gaza Strip have already begun to celebrate the ceasefire.📌The truce, by the way, will be announced on Sunday, and until then the IDF will continue to strike. And judging by some reports, it is doing so right now.▪️Hamas and Palestinian activists (linked to Hamas, but formally independent) are presenting the deal as a victory, even taking into account the fact that the IDF will be able to resume the operation in 42 days.➖➖➖ ➖➖➖It can be resumed earlier, since UN resolutions and other international agreements have long ceased to be restraining factor. ➖➖➖➖➖➖▪️Israeli bloggers call the deal a defeat. Not all of the hostages were returned; Hamas lost several key people, but on the whole it is still viable. ▪️And a new generation of youth has appeared, who spent a year and a half under the blows of the IDF and buried their peers. So there will be no problems with mobresources for a new foray in the style of October 7th.🔻As for the details of the deal, there are not too many official statements yet. There are media reports about the release of 32 Israeli hostages and the return of one body. 2,000 prisoners from Israeli prisons will return to Gaza/Palestine. These are both militants and detained West Bank residents. Meanwhile, the first trucks with humanitarian aid enter the enclave. However, it is hardly worth counting on a long-term restoration of peace in the region.#Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for January 15, 2025 Today information has appeared on the Internet that an agreement has been reached between representatives of Hamas and Israel regarding the cessation of hostilities in the Gaza Strip. The agreement should take effect in 24 hours. Despite this, Israeli troops continued to attack populated areas of the Palestinian enclave. In the last 24 hours alone, at least 30 local residents have been killed as a result of shelling, including in the area where refugee tents were located. There has been a slight increase in the activity of Israeli troops on the Lebanese-Israeli border - movements of armored vehicles are reported in Mays al-Jabal and near Maroun al-Ras, as well as shelling by IDF tanks on the western outskirts of Yarun.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️ 🇦🇿🇷🇺 Negotiations between the pilots of the crashed Azerba...
Description: Rybar: ❗️🇦🇿🇷🇺🖇 Apologize and pay: the President of Azerbaijan blames Russia for the tragedy over Grozny without trial or investigation. President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev made an official statement regarding the plane crash in Aktau. He directly said that the plane was hit... 🇦🇿🇷🇺 Negotiations between the pilots of the crashed Azerbaijani plane have been published. Finally, a complete transcript of the negotiations between the Embraer 190 pilots of Azerbaijan Airlines and dispatchers on the day of the tragedy on December 25 has appeared online. 📌As follows from the records, all key decisions - from refusing to land in Grozny and Makhachkala to returning to Baku, and then flying to Aktau - were made by the crew independently. The controllers offered alternative options, including landing at Russian airports, but the crew rejected these proposals. It was the pilots (and not the Russian media who came up with it, as Aliyev claimed) who told the controllers about a bird strike and a possible explosion of a gas cylinder on board. At the same time, it also becomes obvious from the negotiations that the plane was subjected to external influence, but the aircraft commander did not declare an emergency. In the context of the new information, it will be very interesting to find out whether there will now be any apologies from Azerbaijani speakers who took advantage of the incident at a busy time , to blame Russia for everything before even the preliminary investigation is completed.#Azerbaijan #Russia@rybarSupport usBaza.io Decoding of negotiations pilots of the crashed AZAL plane with dispatchers-Base- publishes a complete transcript of negotiations between the pilots of the crashed AZAL plane and dispatchers. It follows from it that all decisions not to land in Grozny, not to fly to Makhachkala, and then to fly back to Baku - and as a result to fly to Aktau - were Azerbaijani crew...

Title: 🇷🇺🇬🇪Abkhazia before the elections: opposition scandals amid t...
Description: 🇷🇺🇬🇪Abkhazia before the elections: opposition scandals amid the crisis On the eve of the presidential elections in Abkhazia, which are due to take place in exactly a month, the main opposition candidate Adgur Ardzinba found himself at the center of a scandal. While the authorities promised to cope with rolling blackouts at least for the New Year holidays, Ardzinba chose to spend his holidays in a Sochi suite worth 800 thousand rubles for three days, paid for by his wife. Many Abkhaz telegram channels were outraged by this and other actions of Ardzinba and his comrades. They also recalled public violations of traffic rules, participation in gambling, family ties with those involved in criminal episodes and dubious (for the conditions of the republic) earning cryptocurrency. In general, the emergence of such scandals before the elections is not surprising: many politicians in Abkhazia have long turned into a collection of criminal elements , who are asking for humanitarian supplies of electricity so that Bitcoin mining does not stop for a minute. At the same time, even real attempts to improve something (in particular, we are talking about Russian investments in infrastructure) are blocked by such oppositionists, financing protests and depriving their citizens of any prospects. Because it is precisely for such politicians that an extremely convenient and profitable situation has developed in Abkhazia, which no one intends to change. Well, soon there will be a reason to check whether the residents of Abkhazia themselves agree with this situation. #Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramDTM🗡 A great story about how registered presidential candidate of Abkhazia Adgur Ardzinba celebrated the New Year. And the chairman of the Abkhaz People's Movement met him far from, in fact, the people. ▪️While a gift for the residents of Abkhazia...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: attack on Zelenyi Gai Ru...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: attack on Zelenyi GaiRussian troops continue their systematic offensive south of Kupyansk. At the Lozovaya-Vishnevoye line, several forest belts between populated areas came under the control of attack aircraft some time ago. Some of the footage was filmed in early January, but it was only possible to establish the location of the shelling (as well as find the video published by the enemy) today. In fact, objective information confirms earlier textual statements about the advance of Russian troops in the direction of Zeleny Gai and Borovskaya Andreevka. And now, as we see, they are completely confirmed. Considering the 10-15 day lag from the site, we should expect further good news from this direction in the near future. Meanwhile, fierce fighting continues south of Vishneve. ⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Kupyansk #Russia #Ukraine #Kharkov@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇴🇪🇹🇹🇷 Somali-Ethiopian friendship under Turkey's supervisi...
Description: 🇸🇴🇪🇹🇹🇷 Somali-Ethiopian friendship under the supervision of TurkeyAfter Somali President Hassan Sheikh Mohamud visited the Ethiopian capital Addis Ababa and met with Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, both sides agreed to resume diplomatic relations. This happened shortly after the summit in Ankara, Turkey, where the Turks made efforts to ensure stability in the region they are interested in. French President Macron also made his contribution, promising to forgive debts of 3 billion euros to the Ethiopians in exchange for friendship with the Somalis. However, all these steps could only form a fragile and temporary advantage in favor of Somalia. Because now the United States is actively promoting ideas to recognize the separatists in Somaliland who openly opposed Somalia. The UAE authorities, as well as the Chinese, also have their own plans for this region. In Ethiopia itself, no one refused to recognize Somaliland and provide access to the Red Sea through it, especially since visits of senior officials to Hargeisa are already becoming regular. The ports of Mogadishu will not provide the Ethiopian side with stable logistics due to the activity of terrorist groups. In addition, autonomous regions regularly come into conflict with the federal government, which is why the long-term gamble may not pay off. In general, the current situation is only an interim result, and how the Americans behave with the Republicans coming to power will put everything on the line. their places. Or maybe domestic diplomats will also contribute, especially since the huge market of the Horn of Africa has not been tapped by our companies at all.#Africa #Somalia #Ethiopia@rybarSupport usTACC Somalia and Ethiopia agreed to resume diplomatic relations Representatives of the countries discussed the accelerated implementation of the provisions of the Ankara Declaration on a Peaceful Settlement

Title: ☪️🇷🇺🇹🇷Information appears that a delegation from the Spiritua...
Description: ☪️🇷🇺🇹🇷There is information that a delegation from the Spiritual Administration of Muslims, together with the Mufti of Moscow Ildar Alyautdinov, was seen at a training session with Turkish theologians. There is nothing particularly surprising here. If you carefully study the website of this organization, it is easy to find out that for many years imams from this structure and its branches in various Russian regions have been taking such courses in Turkey - organized in cooperation with the Department of Religious Affairs. Against the backdrop of odious statements by the Mufti of Moscow Alyautdinov - who already claims to have a certain scandalous regularity in the information field - such trips look extremely ambiguous. And if we remember that in 2010, the chairman of the Muslim Spiritual Directorate, Ravil Gainutdin, received a warning from the Moscow prosecutor’s office regarding the fact that the Council of Muftis invited a member of the Turkish extremist organization - Nurcular - to one of the conferences - this is doubly ambiguous. Considering the working methods of Turkish structures of this kind (precisely through religious communities and training courses), and at the same time their close connections with representatives of the British intelligence services - in which Recently, employees of the Muslim Spiritual Directorate were also spotted - we would like to expect close attention from law enforcement to these figures. Well, just in case.#Russia #Turkey #religion@rybar together with @dixi_devilSupport usTelegramGlobalistics🇷🇺🇹🇷 The information is unconfirmed. In the video, as they say, representatives of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims (DUM) of Russia in Turkey are receiving advanced training from the Turkish theologians. Title: 🇷🇺🪖 War from a personal pocket: a tale of satellite communicat...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖 War from a personal pocket: a tale of satellite communications The other day we mentioned the unresolved problem of providing troops with light vehicles and spare parts, which soldiers buy at their own expense. This, alas, is not the only thing that military personnel have to take for their money. For example, similar difficulties are often encountered by UAV crews who use domestic satellite antennas (yes, not Starlink alone) to broadcast video from drones to a command post via the Internet. There is just a nuance: the traffic is not free and costs about 20 thousand rubles per 100 gigabyte. If you consider that its daily consumption for organizing a stream from drones is on average from 20 to 50 gigabytes, then the package is enough for 2-3 days.➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️It’s not difficult to calculate that a single calculation can cost this per month from 200 thousand rubles, which no one compensates. And with other unpaid expenses, the lion’s share of the soldiers’ salaries is spent on everything about everything.➖➖➖➖➖➖Doesn’t the army have funds for such tasks? Otherwise, you know, the report about the violation of combat control at the site due to the fact that the crew ran out of personal funds to pay for satellite Internet sounds surreal. In the end, as Alexander Kharchenko noted, it’s not 1612, and it’s not the population must dress and arm personnel. Isn't it true? #WSRF #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🪖 Again about light vehicles in the troops Yesterday, Alexander Kharchenko again raised the topic of providing troops with light vehicles. Alas, the situation has not changed radically, and three years later the fighters mainly receive cars from volunteers, or even buy them...

Title: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 The Russian Ministry of Defense announced a new exchan...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 The Russian Ministry of Defense reported a new exchange of prisoners of war according to the formula -25 to 25-. Title: 🇷🇺🇨🇫 President of the Central African Republic Faustin-Archan...
Description: 🇷🇺🇨🇫 President of the Central African Republic Faustin-Archange Touadera flew to Moscow to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin. On the agenda are issues of cooperation in the areas of economics, security and humanitarian affairs, as reported at the Russian embassy. This visit followed the lifting of restrictions on the import of weapons and the export of diamonds, introduced by the UN and lifted with the support of Russia. So it is possible that during this meeting Touadera will try to achieve another shipment of humanitarian aid, as well as ask for assistance in lifting the remaining restrictions. What our side will ask in return is still unknown. Although it’s worth starting to speak from a tougher position a long time ago. For example, in exchange for all past benefits and saving the status (and life, for that matter) of Touadera, demand the opening of an official Russian base in the country and preferences for our mining companies. But, unfortunately, this process is constantly being delayed while the Central African elites are successfully establishing ties with the French.#Africa #Russia #CAR @rybarSupport usTelegramRuptly ∙ First Russian Video Agency🇷🇺🇨🇫To the solemn music: President of the Central African Republic Faustin-Archange Touadera arrived in Moscow on an official visit by Faustin-Archange Touadera will discuss with Vladimir Putin issues of cooperation between the Central African Republic and Russia - in the areas of economics, security...

Title: 🔁 🇦🇺🇷🇺For the second day, the Australian media have been hys...
Description: Forwarded From Tasmanian Devil🇦🇺🇷🇺For the second day, the Australian media have been hysterical about their mercenary Oscar Jenkins, who was captured in Russia. With reference to Ukrainian sources, it is reported that the militant from Australia is allegedly already dead. Official Canberra does not confirm this, but is already threatening to expel the Russian ambassador if anything happens. 🔻It’s funny that just the other day another Australian mercenary, who lost his leg in the war against Russia, complained that he was being ignored by his own Foreign Ministry, although he really asked for evacuation from inhumane conditions in a Ukrainian hospital, where he was literally rotting alive. But after a wave of hate on Australian social networks, he said that he was refusing such a request. What is the reason for such agility on the part of the Australian side because of the militant Jenkins, who clearly has some kind of mental disorder (he sterilized himself)? Soon elections and an informally launched election campaign.🔻Three years ago, on the eve of the elections, local politicians already practiced this, but never expelled anyone. The local politician later returned to the topic of expelling the Russian ambassador several times. First of all, the expulsion was demanded by the opposition, which in this way tried to raise its ratings from the bottom and show how weak Labor was. The Albanizi government responded that it was important for them to maintain their embassy in Moscow in order to more effectively put pressure on Russia. In fact, the embassy is needed not so much by Canberra as by the entire Anglo-Saxon bloc - they have a terrible shortage of diplomats in Moscow. By the way, there are now only six people in the Australian embassy. Will there be deportation this time if it suddenly turns out that the militant is dead? The stakes in these elections are too high - both Labor and the Liberal Conservatives are electorally very weak, and the anti-Russian theme has always been fertile for populism.🔻There is definitely no point in worrying about a possible decline in diplomatic relations. Australian politicians of both major parties have degenerated incredibly in the last decade, as if they had been bitten by Ukraine or the Baltics. There is simply no one to talk to there. The expulsion of the Russian ambassador could also have the opposite effect. There is no public demand for the return of the captured militant. Over the course of three years, the local public has changed on the topic of the Ukrainian conflict. The majority didn't care at all. And those who tried to follow what was happening became much more skeptical about supporting Zelensky’s gang. Once again, the militant who demanded that the Australian Foreign Ministry return home at state expense was simply hounded on social networks. A logical question will arise among voters: are you tearing up the diplomatic mission? relationship because of the scum who went to fight God knows where? 🔻By the way, a number of Australians have been executed in other countries (Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam - for drug trafficking) over the past decades and Canberra has never severed diplomatic relations with them. Or, for example, Australian David Hicks, who converted to Islam and attended an Al-Qaeda training camp in Afghanistan, served 7 years in Guantanamo for illegal mercenary work. And two more facts: ▪️Canberra officially strictly recommends that its citizens not go to Ukraine, but at the same time there is no way does not pursue its militants who are killing Russians there. ▪️-Investigations of war crimes by the Russian army in Ukraine are carried out by a character with Ukrainian roots - a descendant of Bandera emigration Glenn Kolomiets, who drags into his reports everything that Kiev feeds him.🔻Accuse Canberra of hypocrisy for not noticing the wave of crimes on the Ukrainian side and mercenaries, useless. It is better to prepare accusations against Australia of complicity in war crimes against Russia, in the attack on the Belogorodsk and Kursk regions - there were journalists, weapons and militants from Australia there. Canberra must pay a high price for this. If the mutual expulsion of ambassadors does take place, then it would be a sin not to take advantage of the opportunity and take away the luxurious mansion on Ostozhenka from the Australian Embassy - too rich for an enemy country.🔻But let's wait for the news on Jenkins. In this case, it would be better if he were alive - there is someone to exchange this bio-waste for.

Title: 🔁 🪖About the Steadfast Dart teaching and the connection with fa...
Description: Forwarded From SPECIAL FORCES ARCHANGEL🪖About the Steadfast Dart teaching and the connection with failures on the Russian Internet Some time ago, a major failure occurred in the Russian segment of the Internet, due to which the work of almost all services and sites stopped. There have been no official statements, but some associate the incident with the ongoing NATO exercise Steadfast Dart. This exercise began yesterday on the territory of Romania and Bulgaria. It will last until February 26th. It involves NATO's rapid reaction forces, and the main task is to assess and implement the operational deployment of troops and conduct a multi-domain operation. And the latter is the main point. A multi-domain operation is the conduct of battle not only on the battlefield, but also in information, space and cyber space. It consists in the fact that, in addition to conventional strikes and attacks, cyber attacks and psychological operations are carried out. We see something similar regularly during attacks on Crimea, when panic is spread in chats, fake videos and photos are used to create panic. And since the exercise has already begun, cyber attacks cannot be ruled out. Such situations have already happened, only previously they were local, as, for example, during a training exercise in Estonia, when Internet services were installed in St. Petersburg. Archangel of Special Forces. Subscribe.TelegramARCHANGEL OF SPECIAL FORCES🪖About the exercise of NATO cyber troops in EstoniaFrom November 30 to December 6, a Cyber ​​Coalition exercise is being held at the NATO Center of Excellence in the field of computer security in Tallinn to train cyber units in the framework of countering cyber attacks. The event…

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 15, 2025 ▪️ Yesterday the ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Report for the morning of January 15, 2025▪️ Yesterday, the Russian Ministry of Defense commented on the night strikes of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on Russian regions: 6 American ATACMS ATRCs, 6 British air-launched cruise missiles -Storm Shadow- (2 more shot down over the Black Sea), 31 Aircraft-type UAV. The usual warning of retaliatory actions may be realized in the near future: the enemy announced at night that our Tu-95ms strategic bombers were moving towards the launch lines. At 6:45 Moscow time, missile launches were reported. ▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reported that the enemy is trying to prevent the encirclement of its group in the Sudzhansky region by transferring a group of special forces to the state border, whose forces launched an unsuccessful counterattack on our positions. Fighting continues on the approaches to Makhnovka and Nikolaevka. The destruction of enemy reserves in the Sumy region continues: a combined strike of missile weapons and loitering ammunition struck a concentration of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Confirmed enemy losses are reported: more than 180 personnel, 17 armored fighting vehicles, 8 units of military equipment and an ammunition depot.▪️ In the Krasnolimansky direction, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of the village. Thorns. This was an important settlement north of Torskoye, the latter could not be captured for a long time (before that, active battles took place to the east), due to the difficult terrain. ▪️ From the Hours of Yar, messages come about the successes of the Russian Armed Forces in the citadel of the enemy’s defense - at the fireproof plant. Probably, the results of the actions of our forces to deprive the enemy of logistics capabilities in the combat area are having an impact. There have been no shots of objective control from the ground yet.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), heavy fighting continues in the northern part of the city. To the west, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the Shcherbinovka area, maintaining the initiative.▪️ West of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk), the enemy reports fighting on the outskirts of the village. Successful and in the Kotlino area, which means the actions of our forces to deprive the Ukrainian Armed Forces of another supply road for the border zone in the city. From the southwest, the Russian Armed Forces attack near the village. Zverevo.▪️ North-west of Kurakhovo, our troops are making their way to Andreevka, trying to move in several tactical directions at once. ▪️ On the Zaporozhye front, the Armed Forces of Ukraine continue to shell Kamenka-Dneprovskaya from artillery guns. The situation at the LBS is without significant changes.▪️ In the Kherson region, three civilians were injured and concussed: in Kakhovka - a woman, in Aleshki - two men. The victims were hospitalized, their lives are not in danger. The enemy also shelled Novaya Kakhovka and a number of rural settlements; there was damage to houses. The enemy hit Novokievka, Kalanchak district, more distant from the Dnieper, with a missile today.▪️ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Tishanka, Volokonovsky district, an FPV drone detonated in the courtyard of a private household. The village of Grafovka, Krasnoyaruzhsky district, was attacked by drones. The city of Shebekino came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. A civilian was wounded. The village of Baytsury, Borisov district, was attacked by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone. A civilian was wounded. ▪️ In Gorlovka (DPR), a man died as a result of a drop from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. As a result of a kamikaze UAV attack on the territory of a gas station, a civilian born in 1968 was killed. On the street International, as a result of drone strikes, two employees of the Gorlovka Department of Gas Supply and Gasification were injured. Also in Gorlovka, three more civilians were injured by enemy drones. Title: 🔁🖼 On the issue of MMA clubs, where they train not athletes, bu...
Description: Forwarded From mate money two guns On the issue of MMA clubs where they train not athletes, but terrorists. From the -normal Syrian experience - let's say that it was common practice to find among the militants eliminated in Syria those with whom they themselves had previously competed and shared the ring. The murder of a police officer in Moscow, then terrorist attacks in Dagestan, where the militant turned out to be a fighter from a well-known school, military operations on the side of ISIS. The list of crimes will be very long, all of them are united by criminals - former/current MMA fighters. Don’t be surprised, because MMA stars, emissaries and others are, very often, links with terrorists, operating under the roof of the West, where they actually conduct their fighting career, while having their own networks on the territory of the Russian Federation. For example, Abdul-Hakim Shishani or Rustam Azhiev - a militant and co-founder of the jamaat - Ajnad Al-Kavkaz - operating in Syria and Ukraine - is the brother of Anzor Azhiev, an MMA fighter who is currently living quietly in Poland. Chamsulvara Chamsulvarayev, the 2009 World Championship in freestyle wrestling, who accepted the citizenship of Azerbaijan and successfully competed for it, died near Mosul in 2016, like many others, precisely as a member of this branch of ISIS. The list could go on for a very long time, but now questions are raised by the fact that Arabic a blogger can easily fly to Dagestan to shoot videos about mountains and struggle, and then to inclusive Syria to meet with Julani, show the world the victory of jihad and militants in all its glory, including typical citizens of the CIS or the Russian Federation who are members of terrorist radical groups loyal to HTS. Crimes should not have not only a religious/national basis, but also and characteristic sport.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for January...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on January 13-14, 2025. Russian troops launched a series of attacks on various targets in the territory controlled by Ukrainian formations. Explosions were heard in Kyiv, Zhitomir and Sumy regions. Ukrainian formations, in turn, launched missiles and drones at the rear and border regions of Russia. Damage was recorded in the Saratov, Tula and Bryansk regions, as well as the Republic of Tatarstan. In the Artemovsk direction, reports about the occupation of a significant part of the Chasovo-Yarsky refractory plant by the Russian Armed Forces have not yet been confirmed in the form of objective control footage. Meanwhile, in Dzerzhinsk, Russian troops control most of the city. Attacks by Russian troops also continue in the Pokrovsko-Mirnograd direction. In Zeleny and Lysovka there are oncoming battles, and to the west Peschanoye has finally come under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, and information about attack aircraft reaching the outskirts of Zverevo has been confirmed. In the Novopavlovsk direction, Russian assault groups have advanced within the borders of Novoelizavetovka, as well as to the west of Novovasilyevka. And in the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces finally liberated the settlement of Neskuchnoye, while Bolshaya Novoselka was actually captured in pincers. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Pokrovsko-Mirnogradskoe direction (ru; en) Vremevskoe direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Artemovsk #digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #Vremevka #map #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for January 13-14, 2025 Over the past few days, the expected signing of an agreement between Hamas and Israel to declare a ceasefire and exchange hostages for prisoners in Israeli prisons has been actively discussed on the Internet. According to media reports, it will be announced soon. Nevertheless, for now, Israeli troops continue to carry out massive attacks on various areas of the Gaza Strip: over the past two days, both the capital of the Palestinian enclave and all other major cities, including Khan Yunis, Rafah and Deir al-Balah, have come under fire. At the same time, IDF units are conducting a ground operation in Jabaliya and Beit Hanoun, where they are actually conducting the so-called. -terraforming of the area-. Moreover, over the past week, at least 15 Israeli soldiers have been killed during clashes and ambushes. The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border remains tense - the agreement on a 60-day ceasefire there is due to end in less than two weeks. At the same time, yesterday the Israeli Air Force launched a series of the most powerful strikes on Lebanese territory in the last two months. Representatives of the Yemeni movement Ansarallah are also active, having again launched rockets and UAVs into the center of Israel. Most of the ammunition was intercepted on approach, but the fragments of one of the missiles crashed near Jerusalem.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscribing to map .rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩 Moldovans refuse to pay for gas Moldovans launched a campaig...
Description: 🇲🇩 Moldovans refuse to pay for gas Moldovans launched a campaign on social networks calling for them not to pay gas bills in order to somehow influence the Moldovan government. Users from Orhei report that more than 70 people have already refused to pay for gas.❗️Citizens receive bills from 4000 to 5300 lei, that is, from 20 to 30 thousand rubles. At the same time, the average monthly salary in the republic in 2024 was just over 13.7 thousand lei. The energy crisis is forcing Moldovans to pay a significant part of their earnings to pay for gas. For example, in 2023, Moldovans paid 45% more for gas than the EU average. Although Maia Sandu’s office enthusiastically stated that they do not buy gas from Gazprom, as they have found a cheaper alternative. 🔻While Sandu and her team are saying that Russia is supposedly to blame for the crisis, their ally represented by the so-called. Ukraine has already set its sights on destroying the Turkish Stream, which will leave no chance for the region to survive. However, many Moldovans and Pridnestrovians understand everything and openly express their indignation to Sandu and her officials. #Moldova #Transnistria@rybarSupport usTelegramGagauz RepublicMoldavians en masse began to refuse to pay for gasMore than 70 people in the city of Orhei began to refuse to pay gas bills. Activists are calling for people to join the action in order to influence the actions of the authorities and call for finding a way to resolve the situation...

Title: 🔁 A good example of the fact that information, especially that e...
Description: Forwarded From Unofficial Bezsonov A good example of the fact that information, especially that evokes emotions, especially negative ones, should be treated very carefully and not blindly believed. If this information really interests you, then try to figure it out, collect additional data or wait for it to appear.  Many have heard about a rather scandalous story when the mobilized Nikita Gorelov, who became the head of Sosnovka, Kirov region, announced blatant cases of corruption because of which they want to fire him and send him back to war, etc. Based on this statement, law enforcement agencies immediately began a comprehensive investigation. However, there is another side to the coin. A video appeared online from Gorelov’s immediate commander, who was perplexed by this story and negatively characterized the latter. Information has also appeared online that Gorelov is being used by local elites to fight their political competitors. Earlier, Rybar wrote that this story is very strange and no matter how Gorelov was used in the dark in order to discredit the President’s initiative to attract veterans and members of the Military Military District to the managerial public civil service.    In this regard, I advise you to filter any information that comes to you, and double-check the information that has attracted your attention. Don't draw conclusions -at first glance-. Remember that information is the main tool of manipulation. Telegram MIG Russia Many have heard about a rather scandalous story when the mobilized Nikita Gorelov, who became the head of the Sosnovka municipality, standing at the monument, began to talk about the blatant cases of corruption that were happening in the economy under his jurisdiction.…
