Title: 🔁🎬 Defeat of a Ukrainian UAV over Tatarstan today. And they pai...
Description: Forwarded From Revenge of GoodwillDefeat of a Ukrainian UAV over Tatarstan today. Did you pay attention to the turns? One hundred pounds under the control of an operator and with a video channel. The only question is where this operator sits and through which systems the control is implemented. His navigation is almost certainly disabled by electronic warfare. Otherwise, he would not have been cutting circles, but would have hit the target long ago. And if there were no control channel, then with the navigation disabled, the circles would have been much larger. The year before last, despite all the bans on distribution among the troops, we managed to collect an extensive database of Ukrainian drones and file tables with frequencies that were and are still used time despite its obsolescence. Last year, the number of photographs of the wreckage of parts of drones, which made it possible to establish their frequency parameters, decreased significantly. In some places, the guys themselves learned to calculate frequency ranges, in others, control over preventing the spread of photographs - debris - was established very strict. They never sent us photos of the wreckage after flying to critical infrastructure facilities. All debris becomes evidence in cases of terrorist attacks and is locked up with the competent authorities. Well, then you understand. The coloring of the towers is top-notch. Revenge of good will

Title: 🇺🇸🇵🇭🇯🇵 Biden called farewell to the Japanese and Philippine...
Description: 🇺🇸🇵🇭🇯🇵 Biden called farewell to Japanese and Philippine leaders On the eve of Joe Biden's departure from the presidency of the United States, the American administration continues to take stock of cooperation with its main allies in the Asia-Pacific region. ▪️If Secretary of State Antony Blinken traveled to East Asia last week, this week there was a video call between the leaders of the United States, the Philippines and Japan. The agenda of the virtual meeting included a discussion of issues of trilateral cooperation. Many encouraging words were said about the achievements in the field of economic cooperation, as well as regional security. Aggressive actions on the part of the PRC in the South China Sea were also noted. ➖➖➖➖➖➖However, at the moment the prospects for this format are relatively vague. The main reason is the change in the White House administration.➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Biden, of course, expressed the hope that Donald Trump will continue the course towards trilateral rapprochement. And many observers express similar opinions. But so far there have been no hints from Trump about the course he will pursue regarding the Philippines and the country's support in the South China Sea. Not everything is going smoothly with Japan either. Thus, the military treaty recently concluded between the Filipinos and the Japanese has not yet been ratified by the Japanese parliament. 📌It can be assumed that the Japanese administration is deliberately delaying ratification so as not to interfere with efforts to interact with China. Relations between the two countries are now actively developing, as we have already mentioned several times. Therefore, it is not yet entirely clear what will happen with the trilateral format. Perhaps the factors listed are only temporary difficulties. However, we will be able to get an exact answer only after Trump takes office and further monitors the prospects for Japanese-Chinese relations.#USA #Philippines #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usINQUIRER.NETMarcos, Biden, Ishiba pledge stronger trilateral ties in phone callMANILA, Philippines — President Ferdinand Marcos Jr., US President Joe Biden, and Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba on Monday committed to further strengthening trilateral ties across various areas of cooperation.

Title: 🔁 🇪🇺 Today in Helsinki, NATO leaders will gather for a summit ...
Description: Forwarded From Severyanochka🇪🇺 Today in Helsinki, NATO leaders will gather for a summit to discuss measures to combat the Russian shadow fleet in the Baltic. The meeting will be attended by the presidents and prime ministers of Finland, Estonia, Lithuania, Latvia, Poland, Denmark and Sweden, as well as German Chancellor and NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte. 🔺 At the end of the day, the public will be presented with a joint statement on NATO’s response to acts of destruction of underwater infrastructure. According to Finnish journalist Maria Stenroos, the alliance is developing a hybrid strategy to contain Russia in the Baltic, and the measures mentioned will include the use of new surveillance technologies, as well as changes in the interpretation of laws that will allow the detention of ships carrying Russian oil. ▪️The use of a new shipping monitoring system with AI elements has already been announced by the UK, which launched Operation Nordic Warden in the Baltic Sea to track ships belonging to the Russian shadow fleet. ▪️As for changes in the interpretation of laws, no clarifications have been given yet. Previously, the Finnish media called the armed seizure of the merchant ship -Eagle S-, committed in the international waters of the Gulf of Finland, a precedent. I would like to be wrong, but I believe that we can expect some reservations in the interpretation of international maritime law designed to legitimize this act and subsequent ones. One way or another, any such reservations that may be accepted by countries in the region in relation to international law will be illegal and pose a threat that will lead to a serious escalation of the situation in the Baltic Sea. ❗️What we are now seeing in the Baltic essentially means the transition of Western countries from sanctions to military measures: NATO ships have already begun patrolling, the tracking system has been deployed - all that remains is to legitimize subsequent actions. #NATO #Russia #shadow_fleetSeveryanochkaTelegramSeveryanochka🇬🇧🇷🇺 Some details of the previously announced expansion of NATO presence in the Baltic Sea have become known. 🔺 According to the Finnish broadcasting company Yle, by the end of this week up to 10 alliance warships will be deployed in the Baltic, which...

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 14, 2025 ▪️ Since the even...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of January 14, 2025▪️ In the evening, the enemy organized a massive combined strike on the territory of the Russian regions. From the Bryansk region they reported the use of ATACMS in the area of ​​a chemical plant with the simultaneous deployment of decoys and UAVs. In the Rostov region, 14 UAVs were destroyed and suppressed in the Millerovsky and Tarasovsky districts. In the Saratov region, as a result of a UAV attack, there was damage to an industrial enterprise in Engels, and footage of the fire is being distributed online. Classes in schools in Saratov and Engels will be held remotely today. A drone was destroyed in the sky over Voronezh. In Aleksin, Tula Region (a total of 16 UAVs were destroyed in the region), damage to several cars and outbuildings, and glazing in a residential building was revealed as a result of the fall of drones. The enemy used jet UAVs to carry out strikes.▪️ Counter strikes by the Russian Armed Forces were of a routine nature: explosions were heard in Kyiv, Dnepropetrovsk and Zaporozhye, as well as in the Cherkasy region.▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports repelling two enemy counterattacks in Sudzhansky border area near the State border. All enemy assault groups were destroyed by artillery fire. Our marines are clearing several forest belts in the vicinity of Nikolaevka, and paratroopers continue to knock out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from their strongholds near Makhnovka. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeysky) direction, our troops planted a flag in the settlement. Peschanoye (5 km southwest of the city). Western media reported that Ukraine stopped coal mining at the Pokrovskaya mine (the only place Kiev produces coking coal needed for steel production).▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces continue to encircle the enemy in the area of ​​Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, a flag has been planted in the village. p. Not boring.▪️ On the Zaporozhye front in the Orekhovsky direction, the enemy began using FPV drones on fiber optics, which are immune to electronic warfare. In addition, the enemy is hunting for our electronic warfare equipment with the help of Baba Yaga-type drones, and after striking the formed corridor, he sends the already familiar FPV. As a result of a missile strike by the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the village of Tavriya, a civilian was injured. In the Pologovsky district, a drone attacked an electrical substation, leaving about four thousand subscribers without electricity. Also in Kamenka-Dneprovskaya, a supermarket and offices of Internet providers were damaged as a result of enemy shelling.▪️ In the Belgorod region in the Krasnoyaruzhsky district, a power line was damaged as a result of attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In Shebekino, as a result of the arrival of a shell, the administrative building of the enterprise was damaged. The village of Zozuli, Borisov district, was attacked by FPV drones. A woman and her one-year-old child were injured. In the village of Malinovka, Belgorod district, two apartment buildings were attacked by drones. In the village of Novoe, Volokonovsky district, an FPV drone hit a car. In the Belgorod region, in the village of Lozovoye, a drone attacked a private house, a woman was wounded. In the village of Balki, Shebekinsky district, a UAV hit a car.▪️ From Gorlovka (DPR) they report that as a result of a drop from a UAV onto a car on the street. A man born in 1967 was injured. The summary was: Two majors Telegram Two majors Bryansk region According to residents, at least 10 explosions were heard in the sky above the city. Preliminarily, air defense is working, there are destroyed targets. Two majors

Title: 🇷🇺🪖 Again about light vehicles in the troops Yesterday Alexand...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖 Again about light vehicles in the troops Yesterday, Alexander Kharchenko again raised the topic of providing troops with light vehicles. Alas, the situation has not changed radically, and three years later, fighters mainly receive cars from volunteers, or even buy them themselves. Moreover, consumable components are needed for cars purchased with their own money. Mechanics have to spend their salaries on them - often the funds received from humanitarian aid workers are not included in the supply of the army.📌 Sometimes, as a counterargument to solving the problem, they name the price, they say it is expensive to give each platoon an SUV. And somehow the fact is omitted that this is still cheaper than paying millions for the deaths of those who could not be evacuated or rotated due to the lack of suitable vehicles. Since we were unable / did not want to create a front-line vehicle, in terms of mass numbers and reliability superior to -Loaf-, then you can go a different way. Now, after all, there is a campaign underway to transfer vehicles to military license plates as part of restoring order.➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️So why not, at the same time, accept the same L200 and Pajero for supply? There will be a compromise: some will be satisfied with -black license plates-, others will be able to officially receive consumables and even officially purchase such vehicles for the troops.➖➖➖➖➖➖But for now, some kind of unilateral restoration of order is coming out: if you really want to -legalize- vehicles from humanitarian workers , then isn’t it worth going to the end in this matter with a consistent focus on both balance and supply? #AFRF #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramWitnesses of BayraktarWhat kind of car is needed at the front? The answer is obvious. Soldiers need any type of vehicle. Everything that can move in space will be used for its intended purpose. Smart people are designing the ideal machine for the army of the future. And at this time, the killed -kopecks- and -fields- are transformed...
